WaveTutorial.Tutorial_Announce_CarryGBA_00: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="008cff15245e46d68079173852e98c2c" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]感觉好重啊⋯⋯[etc:Wait frame="8"/]看来只靠[Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]欧庆[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]是[System:Color name="Emphasis" ]搬不动[System:Color name="Default"]了。
WaveTutorial.Tutorial_Announce_CarryGBA_Shortage_00: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="e6ce4774356241d689b72338c611664d" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]人手不足啊⋯⋯[etc:Wait frame="8"/]不[System:Color name="Emphasis" ]增加一些皮克敏[System:Color name="Default"]吗？
WaveTutorial.Tutorial_Announce_CarryGBA_01: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="60cdaf960f9446589f44d878ad0b955d" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]要让[Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]欧庆[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]和皮克敏[System:Color name="Emphasis" ]齐心协力[System:Color name="Default"]进行搬运！
WaveTutorial.Tutorial_Announce_CarryHornBell_00: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="5e070171e5ba4972b30f5a1adc6abe8d" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]它在里面，从这里[System:Color name="Emphasis" ]够不到[System:Color name="Default"]⋯⋯
WaveTutorial.Tutorial_Announce_CarryHornBell_01: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="01caa94ca9b5458eb254fb043a5d9a0b" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]能不能把皮克敏[System:Color name="Emphasis" ]投掷[System:Color name="Default"]到那上面呢？
WaveTutorial.Tutorial_Announce_CarryHimeFork_00: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="5223a57ea2914b7a9fe79bcca4c059b3" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Command"/]给[Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]欧庆[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]下达搬运[System:Color name="Emphasis" ]指示[System:Color name="Default"]吧。
WaveTutorial.Tutorial_Announce_CarryHimeFork_01: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="390e4b7f7bfa4c72bc897ced66017260" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]得把它搬到米格鲁号才行⋯⋯
